mapper.select: INSERT INTO review(editor_id, user_id, content, count) VALUE (#{editorId},#{userId},#{content},#{count})
SELECT 1 FROM review WHERE editor_id = #{editorId} AND user_id = #{userId}

SELECT r.review_id, r.editor_id, r.user_id, r.content, r.count, CASE WHEN count = 2 THEN '★' WHEN count = 4 THEN '★★' WHEN count = 6 THEN '★★★' WHEN count = 8 THEN '★★★★' WHEN count = 10 THEN '★★★★★' ELSE '' END AS star, u.nickname, r.created_at FROM review r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE editor_id = #{id}
